"A.D.2028/4/25/11:30": "To think there was a place like this deep inside the Earth Guide headquarters... I never knew."
"I'm sure there were only a few Earth Guide members who did."
"We came down quite a bit, but this is heading towards the center of the Earth, right?"
"Based on the coordinates, it appears so. Exactly how far is unknown."
"I remember hearing that the center of the Earth is really hot... A-Are we going to be okay?"
"1. It's not a place you just go to"
"2. If you're scared, you can go home"
"The words of veterans are truly something else! Right, it's not a place we can just go to!"
"If I could return home, I would... But, I don't think this is the right time to get cold feet."
"I want to, but... I'll be okay, I think. W-Wait, what are those things?!"
"The Phantoms that <%me> saw...  They're basically the transformed bodies of Earth Guide members."
"Hitsugi, Kohri, stand back. It's our duty to deal with guys like this."
"Kohri, can you hear it...? The voices of these people... They're suffering."
"While they're not people anymore... They are suffering endlessly."
"I can hear it too, Hitsugi. I hear it clearly."
"It's almost as if they're pleading with us..."
"This weapon of mine will save everyone."

"Even if I can't save their lives, only their hearts...
I'll fight!"
"I won't let Hitsugi bear all the burden! I'm going to fight with you!"
"...You two."
"Just you wait, Ardem. I'm going to kick your ass, no matter what."
"God's awaking"
"世界終焉の具現"
